sisow_merchantid.label: Merchant ID
sisow_merchantid.comment: The Merchant ID form Sisow. You can find this in your Sisow profile.

sisow_merchantkey.label: Merchant Key
sisow_merchantkey.comment: The Merchant Key form Sisow. You can find this in your Sisow profile.

sisow_shopid.label: ShopID
sisow_shopid.comment: The ShopID form Sisow. You can find this in your Sisow profile.

gatewayimage.label: Display paymentlogo
gatewayimage.comment: Display payment method logo on checkout page.

keepcart.label: Keep cart
keepcart.comment: Save the cart after a failed transaction.

sisow_urlsuccess.label: Redirect url na 'Success'
sisow_urlsuccess.comment: Redirect URL after a success transaction, leave empty to use default.

sisow_urlfailed.label: Redirect url na 'Failure'
sisow_urlfailed.comment: Redirect URL after a failed transaction, leave empty to use default.

basecurrency.label: Base Currency
basecurrency.comment: Use on every order the Base Currency of the store.

order_status_reservation.label: Order status 'reservation'
order_status_reservation.comment: Only for Klarna Invoice and Klarna Account.

payment_fee.label: Payment fee
payment_fee.comment: Payment fee, positive is amount, negative is percentage or make a comination (eg 1;-3)

payment_fee_tax.label: Payment fee tax class
payment_fee_tax.comment: The tax class to use to calculate the payment fee tax

payment_fee_inc_ex.label: Including/Excluding Tax
payment_fee_inc_ex.comment: Is the entered payment fee value including or exluding tax

sisow_ebill.label: Sisow Ebill
